title: Forced to Live With a Wolf-Like Yakuza!? I'm Not to Be Erotically Eaten!
description: A boy's love manga author finds an injured yakuza member outside her apartment. After she takes him in and treats his injuries, he decides to repay her kindness by giving her... "practical demonstrations" of a man's body as a reference for her work.

matches.title: Ojou to Yakuza Wakagashira no Aibu wa Amai ga Takedakeshii
